name: Wintercloak
desc:
A scintillating swarm of snowflakes surrounds you, chilling the air nearby. You gain a number of
temporary hit points equal to 1d10 plus your spellcasting modifier. While the temporary hit points
remain, you are invisible if you are obscured and have not attacked or cast a spell on your last
turn. Your invisibility ends when you attack or cast a spell.
empower:
Also creates a cloud of fog in a 20 foot radius sphere centered on you, which remains
while you have temporary hit points from this spell. The fog lightly obscures creatures inside.
